metadata.title: Dice Bastion Board Game Library
metadata.description: Our collection of board games available for members to play at Dice Bastion Gibraltar.

games.name: Carcassonne
games.description: A tile-placement game where players build the landscape of a medieval fortress city one tile at a time.

games.name: Catan
games.description: Trade, build, and settle the island of Catan in this modern classic.

games.name: Pandemic
games.description: Work together to save humanity from four deadly diseases in this cooperative game.
